description: personal study ID composed by the first authors’ first surname_year of publication_first title word
number of experiment from publication
name of data subset – can include different experiments within data set/ different training conditions/ pre-test data/ etc
year the data point was obtained
month the data point was obtained
day of the month the data point was obtained
name of the participant
age presented in years – see metadata for source of age
sex of the participant
species of individuals participating in the study -bonobo/chimpanzee/gorilla/orangutan
presentation of the experiment to the participants - usually numerical

initial_choice - first choice between banana and pellet to assess participant preference/ trading_control- to assess if participants would be willing to trade food items for their endowment / endowment- participants were endowed with banana or pellet and offered to exchange for the opposite type of food
type of food presented to the participant
number of tubes (with food) that they were endowed with during endowment trials
location of the food described in the food column
choice of food
whether the participants traded or not in trading-control and endowment trials
number of trades in endowment trials
whether participants performed in all trial steps
whether participants returned empty tubes
author provided notes
